repairedDockerfile:
FROM tensorflow/tensorflow:0.12.0-gpu 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y emacs git zip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir numpy scipy matplotlib ipython jupyter pandas sympy nose h5py
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir git+https://github.com/tflearn/tflearn.git

WORKDIR /deep-tweet 

# exec >/dev/tty 2>/dev/tty </dev/tty 
RUN export TERM='vt100' 

COPY ./ /deep-tweet/ 

ENV LANG C.UTF-8
